questions:
What is the photo about?
A) A trees and small rivers
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?  
A) In a forest  
B) At the beach  
C) Inside a museum  
D) In a residential area

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A bustling cityscape
B) A waterfall in a forest
C) A historical monument
D) A group of people

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tall building
B) A waterfall
C) A large tree
D) A flower garden

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) More trees and foliage
C) A city skyline
D) A beach

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A paved walkway
B) A flowing stream
C) A picnic table
D) A playground

What elements are present in the relationship between the center and the background?
A) The waterfall and the surrounding trees
B) A building and a park
C) A statue and a museum
D) A beach and the ocean

What type of environment is depicted in the photo?
A) Urban
B) Rural
C) Natural
D) Industrial

A) A fountain
B) A lake
C) A waterfall
D) A swimming pool

What is the state of the water in the photo?
A) Calm and still
B) Flowing and cascading
C) Frozen and icy
D) Murky and polluted

What is the color of the water in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Clear with reflections
D) Brown

B) Concrete
C) Rocks and soil
D) Grass

A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and natural
C) Wet and slippery
D) Dry and cracked

A) Very high
B) Moderate
C) Low
D) Not visible

What kind of vegetation is seen in the photo?
A) Desert plants
B) Tropical plants
C) Forest plants
D) No vegetation

How is the water flowing in the photo?
A) Down a steep cliff
B) Gently down a slope
C) Rapidly down a series of small drops
D) Not flowing

What is the source of the water in the photo?
A) A river
B) A spring
C) Rainwater
D) Not specified

Are there any man-made structures in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No

What is the primary color palette of the photo?
A) Blues and grays
B) Greens and browns
C) Reds and oranges
D) Blacks and whites

What is the photo's perspective?
A) Aerial view
B) Eye-level view
C) Low-angle view
D) High-angle view

What is the primary subject of the photo?
A) An animal
B) A person
C) A natural feature
D) A building

How does the photo make you feel?
A) Anxious
B) Calm
C) Excited
D) Sad

A) Desert
B) Forest

D) Coastal

B) Small
C) Medium
D) Tiny

B) Marine life
C) Urban animals
D) No wildlife

What is the overall composition of the photo?
A) Symmetrical
B) Asymmetrical
C) Radial
D) Geometric

C) Three

B) Cloudy
C) Muddy
D) Not visible

D) In rows

What is the photo's orientation?

C) Square
D) Panoramic

What is the dominant element in the photo?

B) Sky
C) Buildings
D) People

What is the relationship between the water and the rocks in the photo?

B) The water is stagnant and surrounded by rocks

D) Through running animals
